Class HTMLDocument

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aryjr.nheengatu.document.Document
      • com.aryjr.nheengatu.html.HTMLDocument

  • public class HTMLDocument
extends Document
    A HTML Document.

    See more at: http://www.w3.org/TR/1998/REC-html40-19980424/struct/global.html
    Version:
    $Id: HTMLDocument.java,v 1.1 2007/12/26 15:57:42 tah Exp $
    Author:
    Ary Junior
